member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_FORMAT_SUPPORT
member.summary: Describes which resources are supported by the current graphics driver for a given format.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_FORMAT_SUPPORT.Format
member.summary: A -typed value for the format to return info about.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_FORMAT_SUPPORT.Support1
member.summary: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies which resources are supported.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_FORMAT_SUPPORT.Support2
member.summary: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies which unordered resource options are supported.
